SEARCH
Package Service

Class SearchByTitleStrategy

java.lang.Object
Service.SearchByTitleStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookSearchStrategy
public class SearchByTitleStrategy extends Object implements BookSearchStrategy
Implements the BookSearchStrategy interface to search for books by their title.

This strategy performs a case-insensitive search by checking if the book's title contains the provided query string.

Example usage: 


 SearchByTitleStrategy strategy = new SearchByTitleStrategy();
 List<Book> results = strategy.search(bookList, "harry potter");

Since:
1.0
